options.name: option
options.description: The option to edit.

options.name: value
options.description: The new value for the option. Leave blank to reset to default.

premiumOnly: This option is only used in premium servers.
For more information, please see the `/premium info` command.

autocomplete.invalid: Invalid option provided. Please go back and fix it.

config guilds view.name: view
config guilds view.description: View the guilds linked to this server.

config guilds add-guild.name: add-guild
config guilds add-guild.description: Add a Hypixel guild to this server.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild to add.

addedGuild: The guild **{guild}** has been added to this server!

config guilds remove-guild.name: remove-guild
config guilds remove-guild.description: Remove a Hypixel guild from this server.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild to remove.

removedGuild: The guild **{guild}** has been removed from this server!

config guilds add-rank.name: add-rank
config guilds add-rank.description: Registers a guild rank with the bot.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild that holds the rank.

options.name: rank
options.description: The rank to register.

options.name: role
options.description: The role to link to the rank. Leave blank for no role.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
rankNotFound: The **{rank}** rank does not exist in **{guild}**.
addedRank: The **{rank}** rank in **{guild}** has been registered!

config guilds edit-rank.name: edit-rank
config guilds edit-rank.description: Changes the role that's linked to a guild rank.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild that holds the rank.

options.name: rank
options.description: The rank to edit.

options.name: role
options.description: The role to link to the rank. Leave blank for no role.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
rankNotFound: The **{rank}** rank does not exist in **{guild}**.
editedRank: The role for the **{rank}** rank in **{guild}** has been {state}!

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild that holds the rank.

options.name: rank
options.description: The rank to unregister.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
removedRank: The **{rank}** rank in **{guild}** has been unregistered.

config guilds add-requirement.name: add-requirement

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild to add the requirement to.

options.name: requirement
options.description: The requirement to add.

options.name: value
options.description: The value of the requirement. Input any number for the 'API Settings Enabled' requirement.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
requirementNotFound: The requirement **{requirement}** does not exist in the **{guild}** guild.
addedRequirement: The **{requirement}** requirement has been added to **{guild}**!

options.description: The guild to remove the requirement from.

options.description: The requirement to remove.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
removedRequirement: The **{requirement}** requirement has been removed from **{guild}**!

requirementNotFound: The requirement **{requirement}** does not exist in **{guild}**.

options.name: rank

options.name: requirement
options.description: The requirement to add.

options.name: value
options.description: The value of the requirement. Input any number for the 'API Settings Enabled' requirement.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
rankNotFound: The rank **{rank}** does not exist in the **{guild}** guild.

options.name: rank

updatedRequirement: The **{requirement}** requirement has been set to **{value}** for **{guild}**'s **{rank}** rank!

base: Purchasing SkyKings premium gives you a few perks in our Discord server,
and unlocks some features on our bot!
It also supports us, and allows us to keep this bot running.
perks:
**Discord Features**
➥ Access to premium features on our bot.
➥ A custom role.
➥ Access to bazaar flipping bot.
➥ Your own custom VC.

**Bot Features for Server Owners**
➥ No limit on guild or rank requirements.
➥ Faster event update times (6 hours -> 1 hour).
➥ Guild Member Counter.
➥ Guild vs Guild events.
➥ More coming soon...

notActive: This server does not have premium active.
fromUser: It can be transferred to another server {when}.
fromCode: This server redeemed a premium code and has premium active until {exp}.

premium transfer.name: transfer
premium transfer.description: Transfers your premium subscription to the current server.

cooldown: Your premium transfer is on a cooldown.
transferSuccess: Premium transferred! **{guild.name}** now has premium active.

options.name: code
options.description: The code to redeem.

uptime: The bot has been online since {time}.

invite.name: invite
invite.description: Invite the bot to your server.

invite: [Click here]({url}) to invite the bot to your server.

info.name: info
info.description: Displays some information and statistics about the bot.

title: SkyKings v{version}

ping.name: ping
ping.description: Measure the latency of the bot.

pong:
**Pong!**
Rest API Latency: {latency:,} ms
Average Websocket Latency: {avg_ws_latency:,} ms
Shard Websocket Latency: {shard_latency:,} ms

command-usage.name: command-usage
command-usage.description: Displays the usage of a command.

votes.name: votes
votes.description: Displays the bot's top voters this month.

title: Bot Votes
noVotes: There have been no votes this month.

options.name: event
options.description: The type of event to start.

options.name: duration
options.description: The duration of the event, must be between 14 days and 1 day. Example: 1w 3d

options.name: gvg
options.description: Whether the event should be a Guilds vs Guilds event. Premium is required for this option.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to send the event to. Defaults to the current channel.

options.name: role
options.description: The role to ping for the start of the event.

options.name: schedule_event
options.description: Whether or not the bot should register the event with Discord.

eventStartedNotScheduled: Unfortunately, I wasn't able to register the event with Discord.
invalidDuration: The duration you provided was invalid.
For example, you can use `1w 3d` for 1 week and 3 days.
durationLimited: The event can only last between 14 days and 1 day.

event join.name: join
event join.description: Joins the event running in this server.

eventJoined: You've successfully joined the event in **{ctx.guild.name}**!

event leave.name: leave
event leave.description: Leaves the event running in this server.

eventLeft: You've successfully left the event in **{ctx.guild.name}**!

event position.name: position
event position.description: Shows the position of a player in the event.

options.name: player
options.description: The player to show the position of.

playerPosition: {player} has {xp:,} XP in the event and is #{pos:,} out of {players:,} players.

*.note: Catches all errors that aren't here.
message:
An unhandled error occured. This has been reported.

{e.__class__.__name__}: {e}

0.note: Raised in config edit if an invalid option is chosen.
message: {option} is not a valid option.

1.note: Raised in config edit if an invalid value is chosen.
message: {value} is not a valid value for that option.

2.note: Raised if an un-assignable role is chosen and can't be used.
message: {role.mention} cannot be used because it's managed and cannot be assigned.
Please try a different role.

3.note: Raised when adding guilds if the guild already exists.
message: That guild has already been linked to this server.

4.note: Raised when trying to edit a guild that doesnt exist in the database.
message: That guild has not been added to this server.

5.note: Raised when adding a guild rank that already exists.
message: That rank has already been linked to a role.

6.note: Raised when trying to edit a guild rank that doesnt exist in the database.
message: That rank has not been added to this server.

7.note: Raised when trying to add a guild requirement that already exists in the database.
message: That requirement has already been added to this guild.

8.note: Raised when trying to manage a guild requirement that doesn't exist in the database.
message: That requirement has not been added to this guild.

9.note: Raised when trying to add a rank requirement that already exists in the database.
message: That requirement has already been added to this rank.

10.note: Raised when trying to manage a rank requirement that doesn't exist in the database.
message: That requirement has not been added to this rank.

11.note: Raised when the maximum value for a requirement is exceeded.
message: The maximum value of {maximum:,} for the {requirement} requirement has been exceeded.

12.note: Raised when trying to redeem premium on a guild that already has it active.
message: This server already has premium active.

13.note: Raised when trying to redeem a premium code on a guild that has premium from a user.
message: This server has premium active from a SkyKings Premium member.
Premium codes cannot be redeemed in this server.

14.note: Raised when trying to use a nonexistant premium code.
message: This premium code is not valid.

15.note: Raised when trying to start an event when one is running.
message: There's already an event running in this server.

16.note: Raised when trying to start a guilds vs guilds event without premium.
message: SkyKings Premium is needed to make a Guilds vs Guilds event.
For more information, please see `/premium info`.

17.note: Raised when the bot does not have permission to send messages.
message: I don't have permission to send messages in the specified channel.

0.note: Raised when a user doesn't have premium and needs it.
message: You need SkyKings Premium to use this command.
For more information, please see `/premium info`.

1.note: Raised when an event is already running.
message: There's already an event running in this server.

2.note: Raised when an event is not running.
message: There isn't event running in this server.

3.note: Raised when the command invoker is not verified.
message: You must be verified to use this command.
You can verify with `/verify`.

4.note: Raised when the command invoker is already verified.
message: You're already verified.

5.note: Raised when the command invoker is already in the event.
message: You're already in the event.

6.note: Raised when the command invoker is not in the event.
message: You're not in the event. Join it with `/event join`.

player: The specified player does not exist.

startMessage:
{created_by.mention} started a{n} {gvg}{event} event! Here's how it works:
1. You join the event,
2. The bot starts tracking the XP you earn,
3. You get placed on the leaderboard accordingly.
This message will serve as the leaderboard, and will be updated every {when}. Good luck, and have fun!
**This event ends on {end_date} ({end_relative})**
nobody: Nothing to see here! Nobody's in the event!
ended: This event has ended and all data will be deleted {when}.

notVerified: You must be verified to join an event. Verify with the `/verify` command.
noEvent: There isn't an event running in this server.
position: You are currently have {xp:,} XP in the event and are #{pos:,} out of {players:,} players.
